basics.name: Ramneek Kaur
basics.label: Computer Science Researcher
basics.summary: Computer Science researcher working at the intersection of AI and Geospatial analytics for environmental applications. My current research focuses on climate resilience in the agricultural sector, targeted towards building water security in rural India.

work.name: Indian Institute of Technology, Delhi
work.summary: Impact assessment of farm ponds, check dams, and waterbody rejuvenation on agricultural productivity and drought resilience, using satellite imagery and statistical modelling.

education.institution: Indraprastha Institute of Information Technology Delhi (IIIT-Delhi)
education.area: Investigating computational techniques for micro-level and macro-level transportation problems on urban road networks

education.institution: Akal College of Engineering & Technology, Eternal University
education.area: An Intelligent Framework for Agricultural Land Suitability Evaluation

education.institution: Akal College of Engineering & Technology, Eternal University
